name: Dream-MultiplayerForFun
description:
Play With Friends of yours or Offline. Game is in development it is early Prototype. There will be some problems about  camera, animation of other players, Playing in Offline etc. Game's real Aim is When You want to talk to your friends and want to play something not important this game is for you. There still something in game which should be Uprgraded. So if you Like Game Please Tell me with your comments:)

Walking - W,A,S,D

Spirit - Hold Shift

Q/E - Changing Attack Mode

F1 for Dancing

F2 for Clapping

Menu open/close - Escape or esc

PS : If you want to exit game use Alt + F4
